synopsis: All the Friends live peacefully together in Japari Park. One day, Caracal encounters a lost child in the forest, so she and Serval set out on a new journey to help the child get back home. They receive some helpful hints about where to go from other Friends along the way, but it isn't long before the party faces its first real trouble!

Serval, Caracal and Kyururu arrive in a forest where they meet Giant Panda and Red Panda, two very different Friends with similar names. The trio follows Red Panda's lead to find the place they came to look for, but they walk for a long time and still can't find it. Then they find something unusual in the forest...

The trio arrives at the ocean. The place they're looking for should be nearby, but they can't seem to find it. So they decide to ask two Friends they spotted in the area, Bottlenose Dolphin and California Sea Lion. Dolphin and Sea Lion say they know where the place is, but Serval and her friends can't get there on their own, so the duo agrees to take them there.

The next destination drawn in Kyururu's sketchbook is a drawing of a strange place that appears to depict city lights. As the gang is searching for this place, they meet a Friend who knows about all kinds of different houses. They follow her to see some different kinds of houses for themselves. Eventually, when night falls, they're able to experience something beautiful.

Kyururu and company arrive at Jungle Park, where they've heard they might find a human. As they progress through the jungle, they end up caught between the quarreling Leopard and Saltwater Crocodile. Eventually a Friend who claims to know a human shows up and leads Kyururu, Serval, and Caracal away... but in exchange for information on the human, they're asked to do something that lands them in an even more awkward situation!

In a twist of fate, Kyururu and company find themselves visiting the research facility used by the Professor and her Assistant. There, they learn about the strange phenomenon that leads to the creation of Ceruleans. The Professor says that they can't figure out where the Ceruleans responsible for the attacks recently came from, but Kyururu realizes something and heads off to look into it. Meanwhile, back at the facility, Serval and Caracal find themselves facing a powerful foe!

Kyururu isn't quite sure what to make of the next drawing in the sketchbook. The gang tries to ask a local Friend for clues, but she seems to be in quite a hurry. When they ask why, they learn that another Friend has been persistently challenging her to a race. So in order to find their way to their next destination, Kyururu and company end up participating in a race with them!
